response.original_title: Three Nights, Three Days: Endeavour's Journey Through Los Angeles
response.overview: The California Science Center wins the bid to become the new home of the retired Space Shuttle Endeavour. Through an immense coordinated effort the Shuttle is transported through twelve miles of urban streets. During its journey the city is unified as the Shuttle inspires the next generation of explorers.
response.tagline: Endeavour's 68-hour transport through the streets of Los Angeles and Inglewood; a behind-the-scenes look at the monumental feat of moving a 150,000-pound national treasure through 12 miles of urban, public streets.
response.title: Three Nights, Three Days: Endeavour's Journey Through Los Angeles
